name: training_classes
schema: CREATE TABLE `training_classes` (`course_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `objectives` JSON DEFAULT NULL, `order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `title` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `youtube_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
